# XYZ Mining Ltd – ESG Report (FY 2023)

## Executive Summary
XYZ Mining Ltd consumed **5.2 million liters** of water in FY 2023. While total water withdrawal reporting meets GRI requirements, recycling disclosure is partial and a formal water risk management strategy is currently missing.

## Water Usage Metrics
| Metric | Value | Unit |
|--------|-------|------|
| Water Usage (FY 2023) | 5,200,000 | liters |

## Regulatory Compliance Checklist (GRI – Australia)
| Requirement | Status |
|-------------|--------|
| Report total water withdrawal | met |
| Disclose water recycling percentage | partial |
| Provide water risk management strategy | missing |

## Water Management Overview
The company’s primary water source is surface water from the nearby river. Investments in water‑saving technologies reduced consumption by **3 %** compared with FY 2022. Ongoing projects aim to increase recycling rates to meet full compliance by FY 2025.

---
*Prepared by EcoReportAI*
